<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Chronicler](/NPCs.aspx?ID=902)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Exploration means very little if no account of the details exist. Members of adventuring bands cherish chroniclers who record tales of their deeds.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Explorer_Chronicler.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Chronicler](/NPCs.aspx?ID=902)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 216</row>

**Perception** +14

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Map Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +17, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +14, [Scribing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +17, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), journal, [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), maps, _scroll of [_acid arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2)_, _scroll of [heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Live to Tell the Tale** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** The chronicler is [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11); **Effect** The chronicler reduces their dying condition by 1. If the chronicler is no longer dying, they remain [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) for at least 1 hour or until they regain 1 Hit Point.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +7 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +7 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 20, attack +12
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175), [Pass Without Trace](/Spells.aspx?ID=215)
- **2nd**
[Entangle](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121)

**Scroll Mastery**   The chronicler can activate any [scroll](/equipment/consumables/scrolls) of a 2nd-level spell or lower as if they had the spell on their spell list, regardless of its magical tradition.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-185" />
name: Chronicler
